{"title": "EMPIRE: The Deck Building Strategy Game", "title_search": "empire the deck building strategy game", "title_keyword": "empire the deck building strategy game", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/empire--the-deck-building-strategy-game/", "summary": "The barbarous tribes who fought amongst themselves for so many aeons are at last able to come together to found a wonderous civilization. {"title": "Slitherine's Legion", "title_search": "slitherines legion", "title_keyword": "slitherines legion", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/slitherine-s-legion/", "summary": "Massive Launch sale - 50% off!
